title: Glenn Beck turns his ‘Ukraine Chalkboard to Explain It All’ into a Twitter thread
text:
To be honest, we weren’t going to do a post on this, but then we considered that mainstream media types like Chuck Todd get very, very fussy when you bring up conspiracy theories about the Bidens and Ukraine, and then we saw the ridiculous threat that we’re going to have to deal with Cory Booker if we come after Joe Biden (Kamala Harris isn’t touching the Ukraine angle either and wants everyone to leave Joe Biden alone). Funny how Harris will shiv Biden as some sort of racist over his history with busing but won’t touch Ukraine.

In that light, we bring you both a video and a Twitter thread from Glenn Beck which encourages citizens to look well beyond President Trump’s phone call with Ukraine’s president to the Obama administration and its #UnitedForUkraine hashtag diplomacy.

First, here’s the video courtesy of Mark Levin:

This is a terrific explanation of the Ukraine scandal by Glenn. Well worth watching. https://t.co/1T78Lzxr8v — Mark R. Levin (@marklevinshow) October 7, 2019

But if you’re in an office cubicle and video just won’t fly, here it is condensed into handy tweet format.

(THREAD) 1/ Nancy Pelosi and Adam Schiff, after two years of investigation and millions of dollars, wouldn’t impeach @realdonaldtrump. But a single whistleblower, based off of hearsay, was enough to change their minds? Why? Consider these facts: — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

Not to mention, she announced the impeachment inquiry a day before the call transcript was released to the public.

2/ Democrats want you to only focus on the July 25th call. If you’re doing that, then you’re not looking at what Democrats have been doing in Ukraine for the past 5+ years: corruption, greed, strong-arming a foreign government and the manipulation of the U.S. election. — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

3/ In February 2014, the Ukrainian Regime fell. Democrats were all over the place in Ukraine, although all the media was concerned about was Paul Manafort. But Democrats sent Obama’s White House counsel, Chief Strategists for Hillary and Bernie, Tony Podesta and Obama’s pollsters — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

4/ In March 2014, Obama made Biden the point man for Ukraine. And in April 2014, Devon Archer visited Biden at the White House. 5 days later Biden arrived in Kiev for his first meeting with the Ukraine Gov. — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

5/ Biden’s meeting in Ukraine was regarding a program to assist Ukraine’s natural gas industry, and also discussed the first billion dollars in U.S. assistance. The day after this, Archer was named to the board of Burisma. Three weeks later… Hunter Biden joined the Board. — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

6/ Obama rode in on his white horse to save the day, guaranteeing a 1 billion sovereign loan, 320 million in general assistance, and a fleet of advisors and experts. The Obama admin became the Ukrainian piggy bank. https://t.co/dQYjw6uQYc — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

7/ In April 2015, the Obama Admin and IMF mandated Ukraine set up the National Anti-Corruption Bureau and they signed an information sharing agreement with the FBI. The Obama admin would know all the dirty laundry that Ukraine might dig up. https://t.co/VbrnhFa3HB — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

8/ A man named Artem Sytnyk was tapped to be the first Director. A position he still holds. https://t.co/8fTKHNpSn8 — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

9/ In March 2016, Biden forced the removal of Ukraine’s General Prosecutor Viktor Shokin, who was investigating Burisma. Biden claimed it had nothing to do with his son, but Shokin’s sworn testimony in a European Court completely contradicts this. — Glenn Beck (@glennbeck) October 7, 2019

Beck had better be careful or he’s going to have to deal with Booker on this. No Fox News conspiracy theories allowed!

This whole exercise is to create chaos for the next 18 months, they know the Senate will never follow through… — Daniel Owens (@Owensdm4198) October 7, 2019

Death by a thousand cuts is their game. — David Empson (@Doc_Rock1) October 7, 2019
